attributes.action: Repeal 2012 section 144 LASPO, allow residential squatting.
attributes.additional_details: I was a squatter in the the last decade, for different reasons, and realise now how this resource may be useful to save our society.
attributes.background: In light of the current global circumstances and the lack of provision for homeless and vulnerable people to self isolate, please provide a means for people to house themselves. These are extraordinary times, as the early post war years were; and I believe extraordinary measures are needed again.

rejection.details:
